The designs are also available for purchase on tank tops, hoodies, and t-shirts! Find …

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Cozy Pin Set Launch! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Launching as of December 8, 2021 – the Stay Cozy enamel pins are available for purchase! These are a great addition to any virtual singer collection, and features Luka, Miku, Meiko, Len and Rin, and Kaito, working and relaxing from home!

The designs are also available for purchase on tank tops, hoodies, and t-shirts!

Find them here: ffbf.link/cozypins

The post For Fans By Fans: Miku Cozy Pin Set Launch! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: For Fans By Fans: Black Friday Sale and New Collection!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Those of you who are looking to get some cool Vocaloid-themed merchandise, mark your calendars – For Fans By Fans is having a Black Friday special on all things Hatsune Miku on their website beginning on November 25th. You’ll be able to get discounts of up to 75% off! All Miku merchandise can be found …

The post For Fans By Fans: Black Friday Sale and New Collection! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Those of you who are looking to get some cool Vocaloid-themed merchandise, mark your calendars – For Fans By Fans is having a Black Friday special on all things Hatsune Miku on their website beginning on November 25th. You’ll be able to get discounts of up to 75% off!

All Miku merchandise can be found at this link: https://ffbf.link/Miku

A Brand New Collection

We are also very excited for you to see the Cosmic Wanderer collection that was recently announced from For Fans By Fans, with beautiful galaxy-themed art done by WAWA! There’s a number of merchandise to look through, including acrylic stands, stickers, pillow cases, mugs, and mouse pads!

Browse the collection here: https://ffbf.link/mikucosmic

There’s never been a better time to plan out how to increase your collection with adorable Vocaloid merchandise!

The post For Fans By Fans: Black Friday Sale and New Collection! appeared first on VNN.

The post For Fans By Fans: Hatsune Miku Digital Stars Fan Forge Winners appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s been a few months since we announced the contest, so now we’re here to promote the winners of the Hatsune Miku Digital Stars Challenge, hosted by For Fans By Fans!

Designs are being sold right now, so take a look and support the creators of your favorite designs with every purchase.
https://www.forfansbyfans.com/feature/hatsune-miku-digital-stars-launch.html

And now onwards to this theme’s Fan Forge Design winners!

Grand Prize Winner: “Pop Star” by Hiro Earth People

Runner Up: “Space Music” by Shinkuplanet

Runner Up: “Astronaut Miku” by chemica

Tsunako Prize: “Miku Star Fever” by hazure21

For Fan By Fans Prize: “Digital Stars” by 17ONESEVEN

We extend our congratulations to the winners and all the participants in every Fan Forge. It never ceases to amaze me at the amount of passion the community gives back to their favorite characters, and the beautiful art they make! From shirts to sweaters, bags and posters, even mousepads, the merch choices are almost endless. What are you looking to pick up this time around?

https://www.forfansbyfans.com/feature/hatsune-miku-digital-stars-launch.html

The post For Fans By Fans: Hatsune Miku Digital Stars Fan Forge Winners appeared first on VNN.

item.title: For Fans by Fans Promo and “Piapro Characters Challenge” Winners!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
Hello fellow Vocaloid fans! We are here to let you know about the new promotion that For Fans By Fans is holding starting February 3, 2021! For a limited time, you will be able to get a 20% discount on all new Hatsune Miku merchandise using the code “Piapro20” until February 10, 2021 at 11:59 …

The post For Fans by Fans Promo and “Piapro Characters Challenge” Winners! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello fellow Vocaloid fans! We are here to let you know about the new promotion that For Fans By Fans is holding starting February 3, 2021! For a limited time, you will be able to get a 20% discount on all new Hatsune Miku merchandise using the code “Piapro20” until February 10, 2021 at 11:59 PST.

All sales on designs support the original creators as well. Link provided here!

Now, let’s take a look at the “Piapro Characters Challenge” winners!

Group Prize Winner: Piapro Family Hug by Riyumii

Kaito Winner: Party Time! KRL by Nyan

Meiko Winner: Happy Birthday Meiko! By 17_Ichi

Luka Winner: Stars by Pincca

Rin & Len Winner: R+L Style by Lina.Shingetsu

The entire lineup looks so incredibly detailed and wonderfully illustrated! Please show lots of love and support to these creators and their designs when they are released! Once again, the code is “Piapro20” – live February 3rd to the 10th. Keep a look out for them!

The post For Fans by Fans Promo and “Piapro Characters Challenge” Winners! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Hatsune Miku V4X Nendoroid Announced
item.dc:creator: Momoi
item.description:
Good Smile Co. just revealed Hatsune Miku’s latest nendoroid! While her V4X design inspired both a figma and 1/7 scale statue, she now has a nendoroid on the way! The articulated chibi collectible is currently available to pre-order. Features and Details According to Good Smile Company, the Hatsune Miku V4X nendoroid will have lots of …

The post New Hatsune Miku V4X Nendoroid Announced appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Co. just revealed Hatsune Miku’s latest nendoroid! While her V4X design inspired both a figma and 1/7 scale statue, she now has a nendoroid on the way! The articulated chibi collectible is currently available to pre-order.

Features and Details

According to Good Smile Company, the Hatsune Miku V4X nendoroid will have lots of unique assets! For one thing, the figure stands out with the distinct, angular shape of her twin tails. Where other versions of Miku have her hair in one long, smooth and soft-looking piece each, this version highlights the “sharper”, more dynamic ends that iXima used for her V4 update.

Not only that, but the translucent socks and sleeves are an added detail, along with her hair pieces that are solid pink rather than the black diamonds with the pink light in the center.

Aside from the initial unique details, the figure will come with lots of additional pieces!

For example, Good Smile reported that the figure will have three face plates/expressions. She will have: “A standard expression, a smiling expression, and a starry-eyed expression filled with curiosity”.

In addition, this nendoroid includes two optional parts; a guitar and a pair of glasses! Several extra hand pieces with different poses will be included, which will allow for maximum pose-ability for Miku’s newest figure!

Pre-order and Release

As of now, the Hatsune Miku V4X nendoroid is available for pre-order via the Good Smile Japanese website for 5,500 JPY.

It is also available on the Good Smile US store for 52.99 USD, and Tokyo Otaku Mode for 55.99 USD.

There is no set release date beyond October 2020, however a more specific date will be nailed down in the future.

We’ll keep you posted here, so be sure to check back for the latest updates!

Sources

Good Smile official announcement
Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), YouTube and Weibo

The post New Hatsune Miku V4X Nendoroid Announced appeared first on VNN.

item.content:encoded:
Our friends at Fan Forge have revealed a bunch of new products on the Hatsune Miku Fan Forge community website in celebration of the MIKU EXPO 2020 Tour in the US & Canada!

Check out their website and the Hatsune Miku Fan Forge community designs here!

Some of the designs are available below:

That’s not all of it!

If you’re thinking of purchasing some the new cool merchandise then maek sure to use code MIKU2020 at checkout to save 20% on Hatsune Miku merchandise until March 17, 2020 @ 11:59 PM PST!

All of the featured products are designed by Hatsune Miku fans and artists that will receive a commission on every sale of their work. Make sure to support them by purchasing their work!

Links

For Fans By Fans Official Store

item.title: IA’s MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” OST Available For Pre-Order!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
In an announcement made on IA’s official Facebook page, 1st Place has revealed that the pre-orders for the MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK have opened for all fans worldwide! This new soundtrack features 21 high quality songs and 5 new vocal tracks. This CD was sold at exclusive events in Japan and overseas, …

The post IA’s MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” OST Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In an announcement made on IA’s official Facebook page, 1st Place has revealed that the pre-orders for the MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK have opened for all fans worldwide!

This new soundtrack features 21 high quality songs and 5 new vocal tracks. This CD was sold at exclusive events in Japan and overseas, making it a very sought after piece among fans. It includes multiple messages recorded by IA too!

In this amazing soundtrack you’ll be able to recognize multiple popular producers from the scene such as Shinichi Osawa (MONDO GROSSO), TeddyLoid, ANANT-GARDE EYES, Ishifuro, and DJ DANTZ.

Fans that place their pre-orders through Tokyo Otaku Mode or CD Japan will obtain a one-of-a-kind free item. If you also pre-order through Tokyo Otaku Mode, you’ll receive a special set of badges, while those that do it through CD Japan will receive an acrylic keychain.

Product Information

Artist: IA
Title: MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK (Featuring 21 songs)
Release Date: March 18, 2020
Digital Release Date: March 18, 2020 (Available in multiple streaming services worldwide)
Price: 3,500 yen (excluding tax)

Tracklist

  • Introduction ～Planet ARIA～
  • ARIA’s Breath
  • Dawn of the Planet ARIA
  • HAVE FUN!
  • Discord
  • The National Anthem Of ARIA
  • One Heart
  • Resonance World ～Inner Journey～
  • LIFE LOVE PEACE
  • PARTY A GO-GO
  • Conqueror
  • 絶対領域
  • ホロンボット feat. IA (ARIA Ver.)
  • Reload
  • 夜咄ディセイブ -TeddyLoid Hopping Remix-
  • てるみい (Live Version)
  • Euphoria (Live Version)
  • Resonance World
  • The Eternity And More
  • Higher
  • ARIA ON THE PLANETES ～Best wishes for you～

Pre-Order Information

You can pre-order this amazing soundtrack from the following websites:

CD JAPAN (Click Me)

Tokyo Otaku Mode (Click Me)

Note: Available for international shipping only.

Sources

IA Official World Page on Facebook

The post IA’s MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” OST Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.

item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hatsune Miku, the world’s most popular virtual singer, has a new collaboration with the clothing brand WEGO for the first time ever! This new collaboration has our favorite turquoise twintails singer reimagined in a casually dressed design that’s off-the-charts! The illustrations are drawn by popular illustrator Kocha. Product Information Release date: March 9, 2020 (Monday) …

The post “Hatsune Miku” x WEGO Collab Merch To Release On March 9, 2020! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hatsune Miku, the world’s most popular virtual singer, has a new collaboration with the clothing brand WEGO for the first time ever!

This new collaboration has our favorite turquoise twintails singer reimagined in a casually dressed design that’s off-the-charts!

The illustrations are drawn by popular illustrator Kocha.

Product Information

Release date:
March 9, 2020 (Monday)
(Web store merch to release at 10:00 AM JPT on the same day)

Product Details

  • Sweat Parka: 4,999 yen + tax / White / Black / M, L size ( Unisex)
  • Clear file: 400 + tax /1 pattern / A4 size
  • Acrylic stand: 1,200 yen + tax / 1 pattern
  • Acrylic key holder: 650 yen + tax /1 pattern
  • Can badge: 400 yen + tax /1 pattern

Stores
[WEGO] Shinsaibashi / Sapporo / Sendai / Ikebukuro P ‘PARCO / LaLaport Yokohama / Osu / Kyoto / Hiroshima / Fukuoka PARCO
[WEGO LA] HEP FIVE
[WEGO 1.3.5 …] Harajuku Takeshita Street, Sapporo Paseo
[WEB STORE] WEGO ONLINE STORE
[Overseas] WEGO TOKYO TOP Mongkok Store (Hong Kong)

Sources

WEGO ONLINE STORE Product Page

WEGO on Twitter

The post “Hatsune Miku” x WEGO Collab Merch To Release On March 9, 2020! appeared first on VNN.

The post Brand New “Kagerou Project” Products Available in Shops Now! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Today’s announcement on Twitter comes from the guys at A3 CharaCharge where they have informed customers of the availability regarding new “Kagerou Project” products and merchandise.

全国のアニメショップ(一部店舗・オンラインを除く)にて【カゲロウプロジェクト】の新商品がご予約受付中！お近くのアニメショップよりぜひご予約ください！通販はこちらになります！⇒https://t.co/JFbylPwGsF　#カゲプロ pic.twitter.com/YcDqtBAVjw

— 株式会社A3 (@A3_CharaCharge) February 20, 2020

Kagerou Project products are now available for reservation at anime shops in Japan (excluding some stores and online) nationwide! Some of these include:

  • Acrylic Stand “Kagerou Project” 02 / Cat ver. in a Box (10 types) – 8,800 yen

  • Tin Badge “Kagerou Project” 05 / Cat ver. in a Box (10 types) – 5,280 yen

  • Small case (with ramune) “Kagerou Project” 01 / Cat Design ver. – 880 yen

And many, many more!

Check out some of the products available here.

Sources

A3 CharaCharge on Twitter

The post Brand New “Kagerou Project” Products Available in Shops Now! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie Pre-Orders Have Begun!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Early today, an announcement was made on the official Twitter account of Charaani and POP culture online store “Chara-ani.com” regarding the opening of pre-orders for the ” Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie. 【予約開始】 ❄️雪ミク2020 どでかジャンボふわふわぬいぐるみ 詳しくは→https://t.co/5w7H0raQzJ　 今年も登場💕三月八日さんデフォルメデザインのどでかジャンボふわふわぬいぐるみ予約開始✨#初音ミク #雪ミク #SNOWMIKU2020 #さっぽろ雪まつり #hatsunemiku pic.twitter.com/O7Nn2a9ucT — キャラアニ【公式】🌎 (@charaani) February 17, 2020 With a scheduled release date …

The post “Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie Pre-Orders Have Begun! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Early today, an announcement was made on the official Twitter account of Charaani and POP culture online store “Chara-ani.com” regarding the opening of pre-orders for the ” Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie.

【予約開始】

雪ミク2020 どでかジャンボふわふわぬいぐるみ

詳しくは→https://t.co/5w7H0raQzJ　

今年も登場三月八日さんデフォルメデザインのどでかジャンボふわふわぬいぐるみ予約開始#初音ミク #雪ミク #SNOWMIKU2020 #さっぽろ雪まつり #hatsunemiku pic.twitter.com/O7Nn2a9ucT

— キャラアニ【公式】 (@charaani) February 17, 2020

With a scheduled release date for June 2020, the very cute Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020 plushie is available to pre-order on their official website for only 9,900 yen!

  • The reservation period lasts from February 17, 2020 12:00:00 JPT to February 27, 2020 23:59:00 JPT.
  • There’s a limit of 5 items per person
  • Payment methods include Credit Card / Cash on Store / BOOK ☆ WALKER ID payment & BitCash
Coming this year as well, Snow Miku will be featured as another stuffed animal with a “deformed” design. More news of her arrival will come on March 8, 2020.

Sources

Charaani Official Store

The post “Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie Pre-Orders Have Begun! appeared first on VNN.
